name: Billy Hatcher and the Giant Egg
summary:
He may wear a Rooster Suit, but no one calls him Chicken! 
 
Billy Hatcher must use the powers of a legendary suit to conquer an evil King who seeks to rule with an everlasting night. Slightly mischievous, yet always cool, only Billy can return the light to the land! 
 
-Play as the bold new Hero, Billy Hatcher 
-Use awesome and unique egg attacks to defeat enemies and solve puzzles 
-Explore a vast 3D world to uncover secrets and find hidden items 
-Battle with up to four players in split-screen action
